participant_1.background:
I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from.
i am doing financial business now.
i am a business man.
I'm going to listen to my Ween album and savor the memory of seeing them live in concert.
I'm not rich but I do have a lot of pictures and stories to share from my travels.

participant_2.background:
I wear comfortable clothes that make me feel confident.
I am a hard worker who is passionate about my job
my favorite past time is cooking.
i love to go shopping.
i am in high school.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! How are you?
I am doing well too. Thank you for asking.  I am a business man from Scandinavia.
That's cool! I am a high school student who is passionate about cooking and shopping.
I love to cook as well. What is your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook pasta dishes. They are easy to make and are always delicious.
I agree! Pasta is one of my favorite foods. Do you have any favorite recipes?
Yes, I have a few. One of my favorites is a homemade spaghetti sauce with meatballs.
That sounds delicious! I will have to try that recipe. Thank you for sharing it with me.
You're welcome! I am glad you like it.
I think we should be friends. I love to cook and I love to eat. You sound like the perfect person for me to try new recipes with.
I agree! We should definitely be friends. I would love to try new recipes with you.
Great! I will send you a message later with my contact information.
Sounds good! I will look forward to hearing from you
